description: The Verbatim Titan XS , the smallest portable hard drive in the industry, now joins forces with SuperSpeed USB 3.0—the fastest connectivity in the industry! This rugged and sporty drive offers a shock-resistant rubber enclosure that protects against rough-and-tumble use. Also, the Titan XS SuperSpeed USB 3.0 drive features transfer speeds up to 10 times faster and is backwardly compatible with USB 2.0. The Titan XS USB 3.0 is big on storage with 500GB, 750GB and 1TB capacities. The Titan XS USB 3.0 hard drive boasts Nero BackItUp & Burn software with full system backup and restore. As always, Verbatim stands behind the quality of our products with a 7-year limited warranty.
title: Verbatim Titan XS 500 GB USB 3.0 Portable External Hard Drive with Rugged Rubber Casing 97398 (Black)
